Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;10 silicon^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Encouraging. Try the same thing with other materials such as wood, dirt, stone...heck, almost anything really. You'll find all sorts of things if you just give it a try!

Instructive. Now that you have an ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset; you can start cutting your teeth on all sorts of new creations. Try getting at least 50 ^green;sand^reset; and extracting from it to get ^orange;silicon^reset;.
